author: marvin
msg: Use symbol and header detection rather than probing to determine the determine
the directory separator character.  (The probing would often produce poor
results because of hack fixes that allow "/" to work under Windows or "\\"

author: marvin
msg: LUCY-168 Detect sys/stat.h mkdir under Cygwin.
Always run the code which looks for POSIX mkdir() from sys/stat.h instead of
limiting ourselves to Microsoft options when windows.h is detected.

author: reto
msg: CLEREZZA-510: using ()-brackets to allow different positions of line breaks

author: marvin
msg: LUCY-167 Fix INCREF/DECREF symbol collision with windows.h.
Use long forms LUCY_INCREF and LUCY_DECREF to avoid conflicting with symbols
